title: Jack N. Hyatt Endowment in Mathematics
description: To provide scholarship support for students of modest means majoring in Mathematics at the University of Colorado Boulder and plan on becoming secondary high school or junior high school math teachers or attorneys in the state of Colorado.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for students of modest means majoring in Mathematics at the University of Colorado Boulder and plan on becoming secondary high school or junior high school math teachers or attorneys in the state of Colorado.
